workshop.title: Welcome to Prime Autos
workshop.description: At Prime Autos, we offer the best mechanical and maintenance services for your car. With over 20 years of experience, we are the workshop you need.

mainPage.bannerDescription: Trust us to take care of your car as if it were our own.
mainPage.workshopDescription: Get to know our space and work
mainPage.callToActionDescription: Schedule your next check-up and let us take care of your car.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: At Prime Autos, we have years of providing reliable repair and maintenance services with professionalism and passion for the automotive world. Our commitment is to ensure your car is always in optimal condition.
aboutUs.historyDescription: Prime Autos was founded with the mission to provide reliable solutions for vehicles—from humble beginnings in 2010 to becoming a reference workshop, always committed to quality and transparency.
aboutUs.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to our updates to receive maintenance tips, offers and much more.
aboutUs.philosophyDescription: At Prime Autos, our commitment to excellence drives us. We value honesty, reliability, and quality in every service we provide. Our passion for automobiles is reflected in our attention to detail and customer satisfaction.
aboutUs.certificationDescription: Prime Autos is proud to have certified specialists with extensive experience in vehicle maintenance and repair. Our workshop is equipped with the latest technology, and our team continuously trains to provide the best possible service.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Have questions or want to schedule an appointment? Complete the form below or visit our workshop.
